DESCRIPTION: Affected by buffs and debuffs that affect attacks: Strength, Vulnerable, Weakened, Thorns, Lust, Pen Nib, ....
Allows you to #yParry attacks that are within your #yReaction #yTime amount of your current block. Reduces by 1 each turn.
Permanently remove this card from your deck (not just this combat).
Slowed creatures take 10% more damage from attacks per card already played this turn.
When Bleed is removed, loses HP equal to the Bleed amount.
Purged cards are removed from your Parry options for the rest of combat.
Double enemy's #yBleed whenever it takes #yAttack #yDamage. At the start of its turn, loses #yGush and #yBleed.
